info.name: Tarot API
info.description: # Introduction - [GitHub repo](https://github.com/ekelen/tarot-api) > For all your cybermysticism needs. ðŸ”® > > Provides information parsed from AE Waite's The Pictorial Key to the Tarot, meeting the OpenAPI 3 spec. This was created as a friendly introduction to REST APIs with ExpressJS. [![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://god.gw.postman.com/run-collection/1215211-7a751d34-2ed7-4658-8d9a-684788d146d0?action=collection%2Ffork&collection-url=entityId%3D1215211-7a751d34-2ed7-4658-8d9a-684788d146d0%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3D55fb4adf-1644-44eb-b9db-825b3db96819)

response.name: Get all card data.
response.body:
{
 "nhits": -98691851,
 "cards": [
  {
   "name_short": "ut nulla magna commodo ea",
   "name": "mollit in",
   "value": "dolor consequat adipisicing inc",
   "value_int": -54970101,
   "type": "minor",
   "meaning_up": "labore in",
   "meaning_rev": "elit et ad",
   "desc": "exercitation eu"
  },
  {
   "name_short": "Ut",
   "name": "amet eu laborum",
   "value": "culpa in enim",
   "value_int": -96480628,
   "type": "minor",
   "meaning_up": "officia sed",
   "meaning_rev": "exercitation quis",
   "desc": "aliquip voluptate incididunt in"
  }
 ]
}

response.name: Get cards of specified suit
response.body:
{
 "nhits": 30957907,
 "cards": [
  {
   "name_short": "quis id in mollit",
   "name": "mollit",
   "value": "nisi elit consectetur",
   "value_int": 59499371,
   "type": "minor",
   "meaning_up": "adipisicing qui mol",
   "meaning_rev": "enim in consectetur ullamco",
   "desc": "dolore amet in"
  },
  {
   "name_short": "id labori",
   "name": "laborum sint",
   "value": "mollit sed culpa cillum",
   "value_int": -43314352,
   "type": "minor",
   "meaning_up": "mollit Ut tempor sed",
   "meaning_rev": "dolore sint",
   "desc": "ut"
  }
 ]
}

query.description: Returns only cards of specified suit. e.g. search?suit=wands
Returns only cards of specified value, e.g. search?value=4
Returns only cards of specified type.

response.name: Searches all cards (using q for global text search, or by parameter)
response.body:
{
 "nhits": 30957907,
 "cards": [
  {

query.description: If specified and between 1 and 78, returns n number of unique random cards. Else, returns all cards in random order.

response.name: Returns one random card (or n random card if specified in parameters).
response.body:

 "nhits": 30957907,
